notifications.jsonFormattedMessage: JSON data has been successfully formatted
notifications.themeChangedMessage: Editor theme has been changed to
notifications.jsonFormatError: JSON format error, unable to format

configTypes.staticListDesc: Local JSON array data, such as user lists, product lists, etc.
configTypes.staticObjectDesc: Local JSON object data, such as user information, configuration information, etc.
configTypes.remoteListDesc: Array data obtained from API, such as lists returned by REST API
configTypes.remoteObjectDesc: Object data obtained from API, such as single resource returned by REST API

configItem.urlPlaceholder: Please enter API address, e.g.: https://api.example.com/data

deleteModal.title: Confirm Delete
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this data binding configuration?
deleteModal.warning: This operation cannot be undone, the configuration will be permanently lost after deletion.

emptyState.title: No Configuration
emptyState.message: Click the "Add Configuration" button in the upper right corner to add data binding configuration
